Verses: 1 adhanpinbu, Ammon Puththirarin Raajaavaagiya Naagaas Mariththu, Avan Kumaaran Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.

2 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu: Aanoonin Thagappanaagiya Naagaas Enakkuth Dhayavuseydhadhupola, Naanum Avan Kumaaranaagiya Ivanukkuth Dhayavuseyven Endru Solli, Avan Thagappanukkaaga Avanukku Aarudhalsolla Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppinaan; Dhaaveedhin Oozhiyakkaarar Aanoonukku Aarudhal Solla Ammon Puththirarin Dhesaththile Vandhapodhu,

3 ammon Puththirarin Prabukkal Aanoonaip Paarththu: Dhaaveedhu Aarudhal Sollugiravargalai Ummidaththil Anuppinadhu, Ummudaiya Thagappanai Ganampannugiradhaai Umakkuth Thondrugiradho? Dhesaththai Aaraayavum, Adhaik Kavizhththuppodavum, Ulavupaarkkavum Allavo, Avan Oozhiyakkaarar Ummidaththil Vandhaargal Endru Sonnaargal.

4 appozhudhu Aanoon: Dhaaveedhin Oozhiyakkaararaip Pidiththu, Avargal Thaadiyai Siraiththu, Avargaludaiya Vasthirangalai Iruppidamattum Vaiththuvittu, Matrap Paadhiyaik Kaththariththuppottu, Avargalai Anuppivittaan.

5 andha Manushar Varugaiyil, Avargal Seydhi Dhaaveedhukku Arivikkappattadhu; Appozhudhu Andha Manushar Migavum Vetkappattapadiyinaal, Avargalukku Edhiraaga Raajaa Aatkalai Anuppi: Ungal Thaadi Valarumattum Neengal Erigovilirundhu Pirpaadu Vaarungal Endru Sollachchonnaan.

6 ammon Puththirar Thaangal Dhaaveedhukku Aruvaruppaanadhaik Kandapodhu, Aanoonum Ammon Puththirarum Mesoppoththaamiyaavilum Maakkaa Sobaa Ennum Seeriyarin Dhesaththilumirundhu Thangalukku Radhangalum Kudhiraiveerarum Koolikku Varumpadi Aayiramthaalandhu Velli Anuppi,

7 muppaththeeraayiram Radhangalaiyum, Maakkaavin Raajaavaiyum, Avan Janaththaiyum Koolippadaiyaaga Azhaippiththaan; Ivargal Vandhu, Medhebaavukku Munpuraththile Paalayamiranginaargal; Ammon Puththirarum Thangal Pattanangalilirundhu Koodikkondu Yuththampanna Vandhaargal.
8 adhai Dhaaveedhu Kettapodhu, Yovaabaiyum Balasaaligalin Raanuvam Muzhuvadhaiyum Anuppinaan.
9 ammon Puththirar Purappattuvandhu, Pattanaththu Vaasalandaiyil Anivaguththaargal; Vandha Raajaakkal Thaniththu Veliyile Porukku Aayaththamaai Nindraargal.

10 yuththa Raanuvangalin Mugapputh Thanakku Munnum Pinnum Irukkiradhai Yovaab Kandu, Avan Isravelile Therindhukollappatta Anaivarilum Oru Pangaip Piriththeduththu, Adhai Seeriyarukku Edhiraaga Niruththi,
11 matra Janaththai Ammon Puththirarukku Edhiraagap Porukku Aayaththappaduththi, Than Sagodharanaagiya Abisaayikku Oppuviththu, Avanai Nokki:
12 ennaippaarkkilum Seeriyar Balankondaal Nee Enakkuth Thunainil; Unnaippaarkkilum Ammon Puththirar Balankondaal Naan Unakkuth Thunainirpen.
13 dhairiyamaayiru; Naam Nammudaiya Janaththirkaagavum, Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Pattanangalukkaagavum Thidankondirukkakkadavom; Karththar Thamadhu Paarvaikku Nalamaanadhai Seyvaaraaga Endraan.
14 pinbu Yovaabum Avanodirundha Janamum Seeriyarodu Yuththampanna Serndhaargal; Avargal Avanukku Munbaaga Murindhodinaargal.
15 seeriyar Murindhodugiradhai Ammon Puththirar Kandapodhu, Avargalum Avan Sagodharanaagiya Abisaayikku Munbaaga Murindhodip Pattanaththirku Utpattaargal; Yovaab Thirumba Erusalemukku Vandhaan.

16 thaangal Isravelukku Munbaaga Muriya Adikkappattadhaik Kandapodhu, Avargal Nadhikku Appuraththilirukkira Seeriyarai Varavazhaiththaargal; Aadhaaresarin Padaiththalaivanaagiya Soppaak Avargalukku Munnaale Nadandhuponaan.

17 adhu Dhaaveedhukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Avan Isravelaiyellaam Koottikkondu, Yordhaanaik Kadandhu, Avargalukku Sameebamaai Vandhapodhu, Avargalukku Edhiraaga Raanuvangalai Niruththinaargal; Dhaaveedhu Seeriyarukku Edhiraaga Raanuvangalaip Porukku Aayaththappaduththinapin Avanodu Yuththampanninaargal.

18 seeriyar Isravelukku Munbaaga Murindhodinaargal; Dhaaveedhu Seeriyaril Ezhaayiram Radhangalin Manusharaiyum, Naarpadhinaayiram Kaalaatkalaiyum Kondru, Padaiththalaivanaagiya Soppaakkaiyum Kondraan.

19 thaangal Isravelukku Munbaagamuriya Adikkappattadhai Aadhaaresarin Sevagar Kandapodhu, Avargal Dhaaveedhode Samaadhaanampanni, Avanai Seviththaargal; Appuram Ammon Puththirarukku Udhaviseyya Seeriyar Manadhillaadhirundhaargal.
